scalar:array.comment: /** * Swift Mailer Multiple Redundant Cycling Connection component. * Please read the LICENSE file * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> * @package Swift_Connection * @license GNU Lesser General Public License */
/** * Swift Rotator Connection * Switches through each connection in turn after sending each message * @package Swift_Connection * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> */
/** * The list of available connections * @var array */
/** * The id of the active connection * @var int */
/** * Contains a list of any connections which were tried but found to be dead * @var array */
/** * Add a connection to the list of options * @param Swift_Connection An instance of the connection */
/** * Rotate to the next working connection * @throws Swift_ConnectionException If no connections are available */
//The connection was previously found to be useless

subNode:value.scalar:string: The connection started but reported that it was not active

scalar:array.comment: /** * Read a full response from the buffer * @return string * @throws Swift_ConnectionException Upon failure to read */

subNode:value.scalar:string: None of the connections set have been started

scalar:array.comment: /** * Write a command to the server (leave off trailing CRLF) * @param string The command to send * @throws Swift_ConnectionException Upon failure to write */

subNode:value.scalar:string: None of the connections set have been started

scalar:array.comment: /** * Try to start the connection * @throws Swift_ConnectionException Upon failure to start */
/** * Try to close the connection * @throws Swift_ConnectionException Upon failure to close */
/** * Check if the current connection is alive * @return boolean */
/** * Get the ID of the active connection * @return int */
/** * Swift Rotator Connection * Switches through each connection in turn after sending each message * @package Swift_Connection * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> */
